snippet: SARETSKY--Dr. Lorelle, age 83. passed away peacefully at home on March 11. Beloved wife of Ted, loving mother of Meri and Robin, mother-in-law of Bob, sister of Marcia, grandmother of Chelsey and Tyler, Camee and Jordan and great-grandmother of Stella. She was a brilliant and talented psychologist and psychoanalyst and a beloved member of the Adelphi University community. Funeral Today, 11:30am at BoulevardRiverside Chapel, 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SARETSKY--Dr. Lorelle, age 83. passed away peacefully at home on March 11. Beloved wife of Ted, loving mother of Meri and Robin, mother-in-law of Bob, sister of Marcia, grandmother of Chelsey and Tyler, Camee and Jordan and great-grandmother of Stella. She was a brilliant and talented psychologist and psychoanalyst and a beloved member of the Adelphi University community. Funeral Today, 11:30am at BoulevardRiverside Chapel, 1450 Broadway, Hewlett, NY. 1/3
